org.apache.lucene.codecs.mockintblock

Class MockVariableIntBlockPostingsFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.codecs.PostingsFormat
      • org.apache.lucene.codecs.mockintblock.MockVariableIntBlockPostingsFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamedSPILoader.NamedSPI

    public class MockVariableIntBlockPostingsFormat
extends PostingsFormat
    A silly test codec to verify core support for variable sized int block encoders is working. The int encoder used here writes baseBlockSize ints at once, if the first int is <= 3, else 2*baseBlockSize.
